name: ColliderCircles
description:
Drag your Circle around the Screen, But Be Careful Because There Are Other Circles Trying To Collide With You! Upgrade Your Circles Health To Survive Longer And Do Insane Combo's Such as Colliding With All The Circles On The Screen Without Losing! If You Are Good Enough The Bosses will Introduce Themselves and You Will Find Out They Aren't No Normal Circles...
Have Fun!
